subject: RE: [junit] ANN: New group junit-cookbook
msgSnippet: Hi JB, How do folks join?  It s not showing up on a search of Yahoo! groups.  Do you have a URL to point people to? Best, Scott S.
messageBody:
Hi JB,

How do folks join? It's not showing up on a search of Yahoo! groups. Do you have a URL to point people to?

Best,
Scott S.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
>
> Everyone:
>
> Rather than bother you nice folks with all my questions, I
> have created
> the new Yahoo! group 'junit-cookbook'. I welcome all attempts
> to answer
> my questions and fuel discussion. Please join us.
>
> I will ask you indulge me by letting me continue to ask
> questions here,
> but refer answerers to the new group. I want to tap the
> widest possible
> network for help. It would be best if you could just all come
> to Toronto
> and help me finish this draft. Work on that.
>
> Thanks so much for your help. See you over there!
> --
> J. B. Rainsberger,
> Diaspar Software Services
> http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
> Let's write software that people understand
